item.title: Richard Bartle - Part 1 - MUD (Multi User Dungeon)
item.description: While there are many founders of the video game industry writ large, the dawn of multiplayer gaming is a much more select group of luminaries and our guest today, Richard Bartle is most definitely one of them. He cocreated MUD1, the first Multi... Feed: https://videogamenewsroomtimemachine.libsyn.com/rss

item.title: Richard Dawkins: Why men and women are different
item.description:
UnHerd’s Freddie Sayers interviews renowned evolutionary biologist Professor Richard Dawkins about the enduring biological differences between men and women — and why recognising them remains essential in the face of growing ideological pressure. Dawkins lays out the evolutionary and genetic foundations that distinguish the sexes.


He addresses the growing influence of gender ideology and the way it has infiltrated scientific institutions, education, and public discourse... Feed: https://feeds.acast.com/public/shows/5fad6d24bc034454b53fe011
